QuestData.Title: Nozzlerust Defense
QuestData.Description: You, $c! These undead south of us are being a constant nuisance to our work. Go clear them out, will ya?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Wastes Diggers and 1 Wastes Taskmaster at the digs surrounding Galakrond's Rest. Return to Narf at Nozzlerust Post when the task is complete.
QuestData.CompletionText: Huh? Who are you? What do you want?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh! Yeah, the undead. Here's your coin, bugger off.
